description:
After finally adopting a child, the Sonoyamas were unprepared for the mystery that would soon unravel. Hitori seems to be the perfect son for his loving parents. He's handsome, intelligent, and grateful for his new lavish life—but he has a dark secret. Hitori is actually the twins Migi and Dali pretending to be one boy. And they have a terrifying motive behind their hidden identity.

(Source: Crunchyroll)

tags.name: Twins
tags.description: Prominently features two or more siblings that were born at one birth.

tags.name: Male Protagonist
tags.description: Main character is male.

tags.name: Revenge
tags.description: Prominently features a character who aims to exact punishment in a resentful or vindictive manner.

tags.name: Family Life
tags.description: Centers around the activities of a family unit.

tags.name: Conspiracy
tags.description: Contains one or more factions controlling or attempting to control the world from the shadows.

tags.name: Found Family
tags.description: Features a group of characters with no biological relations that are united in a group providing social support.

tags.name: Adoption
tags.description: Features a character who has been adopted by someone who is neither of their biological parents.

tags.name: Surreal Comedy
tags.description: Prominently features comedic moments that defy casual reasoning, resulting in illogical events.

tags.name: Seinen
tags.description: Target demographic is adult males.

tags.name: Tragedy
tags.description: Centers around tragic events and unhappy endings.

tags.name: Age Regression
tags.description: Prominently features a character who was returned to a younger state.

tags.name: Bullying
tags.description: Prominently features the use of force for intimidation, often in a school setting.

tags.name: Estranged Family
tags.description: At least one family member of the MC intentionally distances themselves or a family distances themselves from a person related to the MC.

tags.name: Crossdressing
tags.description: Prominently features a character dressing up as the opposite sex.

tags.name: School
tags.description: Partly or completely set in a primary or secondary educational institution.

tags.name: Anti-Hero
tags.description: Features a protagonist who lacks conventional heroic attributes and may be considered a borderline villain.

tags.name: Historical
tags.description: Partly or completely set during a real period of world history.

tags.name: Coming of Age
tags.description: Centers around a character's transition from childhood to adulthood.

tags.name: Dissociative Identities
tags.description: A case where one or more people share the same body.

tags.name: Time Skip
tags.description: Features a gap in time used to advance the story.

tags.name: Boys' Love
tags.description: Prominently features romance between two males, not inherently sexual.

tags.name: Incest
tags.description: Features sexual or romantic relations between characters who are related by blood.

tags.name: Love Triangle
tags.description: Centered around romantic feelings between more than two people. Includes all love polygons.

node.description:
[Twitter](https://twitter.com/mankyu55)

**Mankyuu** is a Japanese director and storyboard artist who became known for his short flash animations. After graduating from the Faculty of Intercultural Communication at Hosei University he worked as a freelancer before joining the animation company [DLE](https://anilist.co/studio/276/DLE) in 2006. In October 2009 he joined the newly found production company [Gathering](https://anilist.co/studio/400/Gathering) where he worked until March 2017 after which he became a freelancer again.

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/ayumi_nishihata)

Formerly affiliated with [Nomad](https://anilist.co/studio/70). Currently working as a freelance animator.

After graduating from the Faculty of Intercultural Communication at Hosei University he worked as a freelancer before joining the animation company [DLE](https://anilist.co/studio/276/DLE) in 2006. In October 2009 he joined the newly found production company [Gathering](https://anilist.co/studio/400/Gathering) where he worked until March 2017 after which he became a freelancer again.

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/ayumi_nishihata)

Formerly affiliated with [Nomad](https://anilist.co/studio/70). Currently working as a freelance animator.
Previously working at Tavac, now for Real-T.
Ryoutarou Akao is the founder and representative director of Studio Gao.
